item.title: 000webhost
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Unless you purchased a monthly package from 000Webhost, it doesn’t allow remote MySQL.
So, nothing. Unless you have ^
If so, create a database on the Account Portal, and from there it should redirect you to a text page with all the database info that you just made… From there it’s kind of copy paste.

Read full topic

mysql_select_db($dbname) or die(mysql_error());
